resources.string: "This fast wireless charger isn't compatible with your phone, so you're charging at standard speed."
Moved to left edge and minimized
Moved to right edge and minimized

Turning on Airplane mode disables all network features including calling, messaging, mobile data, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth. To still use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, turn them on in Settings or on the notification panel.

Flight mode allows you to turn off calling, messaging and data network features. It also turns off connectivity features such as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. To use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, turn them on in Settings or on the notification panel.
"You won't be able to use mobile data."
"Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will not be able to use the Internet, Email, or other apps that require a data connection. Turn on Airplane mode?"
Wi-Fi and Bluetooth will be turned off, but you can turn them on again in Settings or the quick settings panel.
Unable to enable Flight mode while Block power off while locked enabled. Try again after unlocking screen.

Turning on Airplane mode disables all network features including calling, messaging, mobile data, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth. To still use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, turn them on in Settings or on the notification panel.
Turn on Wi-Fi to use Wi-Fi calling.
"Can't turn on Airplane mode during a call."
"Choose which apps can set alarms and schedule actions. Allowing apps to do this may increase battery use. If not allowed, apps may not function normally, and their alarms won't work as scheduled."
Press the Windows, Command, or Search key to call your default assistant app. Go to Settings to choose which app to use.
To change the default app, press and hold the Windows, Command, or Search key.
Select an app to open when you press and hold the Home key. To change the selected app later, go to Device assistance app in Settings.
Switching from wireless charging to cable charging

"Charging has been stopped. Your phone's temperature is too high. Be careful when disconnecting the charger. It may be very hot.
Disconnecting and reconnecting the charger may allow charging to continue normally. If overheating persists, contact Customer Service as there may be a risk of fire or injury."

"Charging has been stopped. Your tablet's temperature is too high. Be careful when disconnecting the charger. It may be very hot.
Disconnecting and reconnecting the charger may allow charging to continue normally. If overheating persists, contact Customer Service as there may be a risk of fire or injury."
Unable to charge your device. Make sure you are using a Galaxy compatible battery and charger and that your device is properly connected to the charger.
Unable to charge your device. Make sure you are using a Samsung compatible battery and charger and that your device is properly connected to the charger.
"Your phone's temperature is too high. Charging will continue when the temperature returns to normal."
"Your tablet's temperature is too high. Charging will continue when the temperature returns to normal."
"Your phone's temperature is too low. Charging will continue when the temperature returns to normal."
"Your tablet's temperature is too low. Charging will continue when the temperature returns to normal."
Charge your phone or tap here to turn on Power saving mode.
Charge your tablet or tap here to turn on Power saving mode.
Use the charger that came with your phone.
Use the charger that came with your tablet.
Make sure the cable and charger are properly connected.
"If you're using a cover case, try removing it."
To charge faster, use the original charger.
To charge faster, use the charger and cable that were provided with this phone
To charge faster, use the charger and cable that were provided with this tablet.
Your phone is too hot to fully charge. Charging it somewhere cooler is recommended.
Your tablet is too hot to fully charge. Charging it somewhere cooler is recommended.
Charging has been slowed because your phone is cold. It will change back to normal speed if the phone gets warmer.
Charging has been slowed because your tablet is cold. Charging will change back to normal speed if the tablet gets warmer.
Charging will change back to normal speed if the phone gets warmer.
Charging will change back to normal speed if the phone gets warmer.
Charging slowed due to low temperature
Wireless charging has been paused. Try removing foreign objects or thick cases that may be between the charger and your phone.
Wireless charging paused because your phone is too hot. Try again when it cools down.
Wireless charging paused because your tablet is too hot. Try again when it cools down.
Switching from cable charging to wireless charging
"Automatically adjust your screen's color temperature based on your usage patterns and the time of day."
Device name will appear when this device is connected.
An app is needed to use this device.
"Can't connect to %1$s. Check your settings in %2$s and try again."
"Couldn't pair with %s. Make sure that it's ready to pair."
"Place Bluetooth device near phone or check if it's in pairing mode."
"Place Bluetooth device near tablet or check if it's in pairing mode."
"Couldn't pair with %s. Make sure that it's ready to pair."
"Couldn't connect. Turn on Bluetooth tethering on %s."
Local Internet connection shared with device
Turn on Bluetooth tethering on the paired device to access the internet from this phone.
Connected to device for Internet access.
Allow this paired device to access your messages.
Allow this paired device to access your SIM card.
Connected for calls and audio, %d%% battery remaining
"Can't use Bluetooth tethering while connected to Wi-Fi network."
To use Bluetooth tethering, turn off Wi-Fi on this phone.
To use Bluetooth tethering, turn off Wi-Fi on this tablet.
Exit Samsung DeX to use Music Share.
"Can't open image viewer app in Emergency mode."
Check %s to make sure that the device is still available.
Tap an app to choose which devices to show. Turn on the switch for each app you want to show.
Get quick access to devices from the apps below.
Get quick access to devices from the apps below. You can also use %s to control Bluetooth devices connected to your tablet.
"Controls will appear here for any smart home devices you've set up in supported apps."
Select at least one app to show devices from it.
"Try again or check the %s app to make sure they're still available."

"You'll be able to view basic device status information while your phone is locked. For %s devices, you'll be able to control the main action of each device, such as turning a light on or off. You'll still need to unlock your phone to control door locks and other devices related to security."

"You'll be able to view basic device status information while your tablet is locked. For %s devices, you'll be able to control the main action of each device, such as turning a light on or off. You'll still need to unlock your tablet to control door locks and other devices related to security."
You can show the Devices and Media buttons above your notifications so you can access them more quickly.
Show the Devices and Media buttons above the notification panel to get quicker access to your devices.
Devices and Media buttons will now appear above your notifications.

"Your device is overheating. Steps will be taken to cool it down.
You can still use your device, but: - The screen may be dimmed. - The device may slow down. - Charging may be paused.
After the device cools down, performance will return to normal automatically."

"Your tablet is getting too hot, so it’s taking steps to cool itself down.
You can still use your tablet, but you may notice: The screen might dim. The tablet might slow down. Charging might pause.
After the tablet cools down, performance willAutomatically go back to normal."

"Your phone is getting hot, so it's taking steps to cool itself down.
You can still use it, but you may notice: - The screen might dim. - The phone might slow down. - Charging might pause.
Your phone will return to normal once it cools down."
"Mobile data usage has been paused because you've reached the limit that you set."
Connect to a Wi-Fi network or turn on Data roaming.
"Your phone isn't connected to a Wi-Fi network. To use a mobile network instead, turn off Airplane mode in Settings."
"Your tablet isn't connected to a Wi-Fi network. To use a mobile network instead, turn off Airplane mode in Settings."
Mobile data is disabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or enable mobile data and try again.
Connect to a Wi-Fi network or turn on Mobile data.
Wi-Fi connection required. Connect to Wi-Fi network and try again.
Your security policy prevents you from using your biometrics for two-step verification. Contact your IT admin to unlock your phone.
Add app pair to Edge panel
"Can't open this app in split-screen view. Drop it to open in full-screen view."
Do not disturb is scheduled to stay on until %s tomorrow.
Do not disturb is scheduled to stay on until %s.
Drag to the left or right edge of the screen to open in a new window.
Item at position %d cannot be dragged.
Drop now to open in full-screen view
"Can't open this app in pop-up view through this notification."
Include additional device-specific vendor logs in bug reports, which may contain private information, use more battery, or use more storage.
Unable to turn on Torch. Battery power low.
Battery power low. Torch will be turned off.
"Airplane mode is turned on. You won't be able to use the Internet, Email, or other apps that need a data connection unless you use Wi-Fi."
"Airplane mode is turned on. You won't be able to use the Internet, Email, Wi-Fi calling, or other apps that need a data connection unless you use Wi-Fi."
This app may not work properly in Multi window view.
Swipe up with 2 fingers from the bottom of the screen to use the accessibility shortcut.
Swipe up with 3 fingers from the bottom of the screen to use the accessibility shortcut.
Press and hold the Side key and Volume down key at the same time for more than %d seconds to restart your phone.
Quickly press and release the Side and Volume down keys at the same time.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Wi-Fi tethering, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
Turning on portable Wi-Fi hotspot will turn off Wi-Fi.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
To use Wi-Fi tethering, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
Wi-Fi is turned off when USB tethering or Mobile Hotspot is active. To turn on Wi-Fi, please turn off USB tethering or Mobile Hotspot.
Mobile Hotspot uses your mobile data connection. Your Wi-Fi connection will be turned off.
"The current Wi-Fi network can't be shared using Mobile Hotspot. Mobile data will be used instead."
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices currently connected using Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
To use Wi-Fi tethering, any devices currently connected through Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices currently connected using Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices currently connected using Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices currently connected using Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
%s may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data such as passwords and credit card numbers.

The connected charger is incompatible with this phone. To prevent damage to your phone, charging has been stopped. To continue charging, use the original charger and cable that were provided with this phone.

The connected charger is incompatible with this tablet. To prevent damage to your tablet, charging has been stopped. To continue charging, use the original charger and cable that were provided with this tablet.
Unable to charge. Use the original charger.
Insert SIM card to access network services.
"USIM card not detected Emergency calls only"
Unable to use USIM card. Download USIM card information.
Cannot use USIM card. Incorrect PIN unlock (PUK) code entered %d times. Purchase new USIM card.
This phone has been lost or stolen.
Incorrect password entered 5 times. Try again in 10 minutes.
Enter new UIM/SIM card unlock PIN again to confirm it
Incorrect UIM/SIM card PIN entered. 1 attempt left.
Incorrect UIM/SIM card PIN entered. %d attempts left.
Enter new UIM/SIM card unlock PIN
UIM/SIM card locked. Enter PUK. Contact service provider for details.
Incorrect PUK entered. If incorrect PUK is entered 1 more time, UIM/SIM card will be locked.
Incorrect PUK entered. If incorrect PUK is entered %d more times, UIM/SIM card will be permanently locked.
PIN has been blocked. Enter PUK to continue.
Your phone is currently locked to an eSIM plan. To turn off your eSIM plan, you need to remove all your mobile plans and add the eSIM plan again.
Removing and reconnecting to mobile plans may result in additional charges.
The plans will be removed from your phone, but the charges will continue.
Face recognition unavailable when Clear View Cover attached.
Face recognition unavailable when LED View Cover attached.
Face recognition unavailable when S View Cover attached.
Face recognition not available while cover attached.
If this keeps happening, restart your phone.
Tap here to use face recognition
"To use face recognition, rotate your tablet so the camera isn't at the bottom"
Use fingerprint to open or swipe screen with two fingers to use face recognition.
Use face recognition or enter password to open
Use face recognition or enter password
Use face recognition or draw pattern to open
Use face recognition or draw pattern
Use face recognition or enter PIN to open
Use face recognition or enter PIN
Tap icon to try face recognition again
Use face recognition on your phone
Use face recognition on your phone to verify your identity.
Unlock your phone to get app notifications.
Fingerprint sensor may be dirty. Clean it and try again.
The fingerprint data has been corrupted. Reset Fingerprint as the screen lock type and then add your fingerprints again, or change the screen lock type.
The fingerprint sensor is not responding. Try again later.
If this problem continues, contact Customer Service.
The fingerprint sensor has not been changed properly. Contact customer services.
An error has occurred with the fingerprint sensor. If this message appears repeatedly, restart your device.
Make sure the fingerprint sensor is clean and dry, then try again.
Wipe the fingerprint sensor and try again
Keep your finger on the sensor a little longer
Make sure your finger is dry
Move the tip of your S Pen away from the screen to scan your fingerprint
Due to too many accidental touches, the fingerprint sensor was blocked when the screen was off. When this happens, you can turn on the screen to reactivate the sensor.
Use fingerprint or swipe screen with two fingers to open
Use fingerprint or swipe with 2 fingers to unlock.
Use fingerprint or enter password to open
Use fingerprint or draw pattern to open
Use fingerprint or enter PIN to open
Lift your finger, then press it on the sensor again.
Disconnect from wireless charger to use your fingerprint
Use fingerprint or enter password to open
Your device was restarted and needs to be unlocked using your password. You can use your fingerprints next time you unlock your device.
Use fingerprint or draw pattern to open
Use fingerprint or draw unlock pattern
Your device was restarted and needs to be unlocked using your pattern. You can use your fingerprints next time you unlock your device.
Use fingerprint or enter PIN to open
Your device was restarted and needs to be unlocked using your PIN. You can use your fingerprints next time you unlock your device.
Infinity wallpaper will be applied to your Always On Display, Home screen, and Lock screen at the same time.
Infinity wallpaper will be applied to your Home and Lock screens at the same time.
Use fingerprint to open or swipe screen with 2 fingers to use Intelligent Scan
Use Intelligent Scan or enter password to open
Use Intelligent Scan or enter password
Use Intelligent Scan or draw pattern to open
Use Intelligent Scan or draw pattern
Use Intelligent Scan or enter PIN to open
Use Intelligent Scan or enter PIN
Double tap to use Intelligent Scan.
Type PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers
Use fingerprint to open or swipe screen with two fingers to use irises
Use irises or enter password to open
Use irises or draw pattern to open
Use irises or enter PIN to open
No PIN unlock (PUK) code entered. Try again.
Enter the USIM card PIN again to confirm it.
The new PINs do not match.
An incorrect PIN has been entered. %d attempts are remaining. Contact customer services.
"Create a new USIM card PIN. The PIN must be 4 to 8 digits long."
Enter USIM card unlock PIN (4 to 8 digits)
Enter U SIM card unlock PIN of four to eight digits.

"An incorrect PUK has been entered %1$d times. If an incorrect PUK is entered %2$d more times, the USIM card will be permanently blocked.
If you do not know your PUK, visit a customer service centre."
The PIN was entered incorrectly 1 time. After 3 incorrect PIN attempts, you have to enter the personal unlocking key (PUK).
The PIN was entered incorrectly 2 times. After 3 incorrect PIN attempts, you have to enter the personal unlocking key (PUK).

"An incorrect PUK has been entered %1$d time. If an incorrect PUK is entered %2$d more time, the USIM card will be permanently blocked.
If you don't know your PUK, visit a Customer Service location."
Use biometrics or enter password to open
Use biometrics or draw pattern to open
Use biometrics or enter PIN to open

Use face recognition or enter password to turn on Emergency mode

"When you use face recognition, you'll need to enter your password every 24 hours or whenever your phone has been idle for 4 hours to ensure your security."

"If you do not enter the correct password in the next attempt, your phone will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

"If you don't enter the correct password within the next %d attempts, your tablet will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the tablet will be erased.
If your tablet is reset, you may need to enter the Samsung account information (email address and password) associated with this tablet to be able to use it again."

"If you do not enter the correct password within the next %d attempts, your phone will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

Enter the recovery password to unlock.
Incorrect PIN. Check PIN and try again.
Incorrect PIN entered for USIM card lock. Maximum number of retries reached. Restart device or visit CS centre.
Your password contains at least %d characters, including at least 1 letter.
Your password includes letters and is at least %d characters long.
An incorrect SIM card PIN has been entered. You have 1 attempt left.
An incorrect SIM card PIN has been entered. You have %d attempts left.
Your PIN contains at least 4 digits.
Your PIN is made up of %d or more digits.
Enter password instead of using fingerprint recognition because of security policy
Draw pattern instead of using fingerprint recognition because of security policy
Enter PIN instead of using fingerprint recognition because of security policy
An attempt to unlock the device has been made. You have %d attempts left before the device is reset to factory default settings and all data is erased, including files and downloaded apps.
An attempt to unlock the device has been made %d times. You have 1 attempt left before the device is reset to factory default settings and all data is erased, including files and downloaded apps.

An attempt to unlock the device has been made %1$d times. You have %2$d attempts left before the device is reset to factory default settings and all data is erased, including files and downloaded apps.
Enter the new SIM card PIN again to confirm it.
Enter a new SIM card PIN.
Press the Power key, then swipe to unlock.
Press the Side key, then swipe to unlock.
SIM card locked. Enter PUK. Contact your service provider for details.
If you enter incorrect PUK 1 more time, SIM will be locked.
If you enter incorrect PUK %d more times, SIM will be locked.
Your PIN has been blocked. To unlock your device, contact your service provider.
Enter USIM card unlock PIN (4 digits)
Your device has not been used for more than 24 hours and needs to be unlocked using your password. You can use your fingerprints next time you unlock your device.
Your device has not been used for more than 24 hours and needs to be unlocked using your pattern. You can use your fingerprints next time you unlock your device.
Your device has not been used for more than 24 hours and needs to be unlocked using your PIN. You can use your fingerprints next time you unlock your device.

"Your device overheated. It powered off to prevent damage.
Overheating can be caused by: - Using graphics-intensive apps, such as games and navigation apps, for long periods of time. - Transferring large files. - Using your device in a hot environment."
You will not be able to power on the device again until after it has cooled down.
Your device is overheating. To cool down, it will power off in %d seconds.

"Your phone got hot. It turned off to prevent damage to the phone.

Be careful, as the cable plug may be hot.

Charging has stopped because your phone is overheating. After disconnecting, check both the cable and the charging port for anything that could be blocking the connection. You can then reconnect the cable to check if your phone charges normally. If the problem persists, visit a Samsung Customer Service location.

Accounts allow users to access their own apps and content.

"You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customise with their own apps, wallpaper and so on. Users can also adjust device settings like Wi-Fi that affect everyone.
After you create a new user, that person needs to go through a setup process.
Any user can accept updated app permissions on behalf of all other users."

"When you add a new user, they need to set up their own space.

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your phone, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean, the moisture is gone, and the notification is cleared.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port."

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your phone, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean, the moisture is gone, and the notification is cleared.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port.
In the meantime, you can charge your phone wirelessly."

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your tablet, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean, the moisture is gone, and the notification is cleared.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port."
Reduce battery usage by analyzing Wi-Fi traffic patterns.
